summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence from September 2019 between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) in the Southern District of New York and defense attorney Javier A. Solano. The emails discuss scheduling and the government's interest in interviewing Solano's client, referred to as 'Estill', regarding the Epstein matter, noting an ICE detainer on the client.

persons.name: Javier A. Solano
persons.context: Attorney representing a client named Estill; corresponds with the AUSA to schedule a proffer session and inquire about the government's interest in interviewing his client regarding the Epstein matter.

persons.name: Estill
persons.context: Client of Javier A. Solano who is the subject of the emails; has an ICE detainer; the government was considering interviewing him regarding the Epstein matter.

connections.description: Solano is the legal representative for Estill, discussing his immigration hold and potential proffer session with prosecutors.
Correspondence regarding scheduling a proffer session for Solano's client and the government's interest in interviewing him about Epstein.

events.title: ICE Detainer Confirmation
events.description: An AUSA confirms to attorney Javier Solano that his client Estill has an ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) detainer.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer Session
events.description: A proffer session for Estill was scheduled for the afternoon of September 3, 2019, at the SDNY office, but was later rescheduled due to Solano's trial schedule.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Empire State Building, 350 Fifth Avenue, Suite 5900, New York, New York 10118
The Hub, 507 Willis Avenue, Bronx, New York 10455
keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was, as of September 2019, considering interviewing an individual named Estill regarding the Epstein matter.
Estill was subject to an ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) detainer, which was a factor in potential bail considerations.
Defense attorney Javier A. Solano was actively communicating with prosecutors to schedule a proffer session for his client Estill in late August/early September 2019.
The email chain shows the government's ongoing investigative activity related to Jeffrey Epstein shortly after his death in August 2019.
